items.title: 'In shock': British Indians mourn crash victims at London vigil
items.description: Dozens of members ofBritain's Indian community gathered at a Hindu temple in Londonon Saturday for a vigil mourning the victims of this week's AirIndia crash, many of whom had personal connections...

items.title: Boeing Engineers Turn Startup Arc Into Marine Powerhouse With New $168K Electric Boat That Outpaces Gas Competitors
items.description: Arc, a California-based startup founded in 2021 by former Boeing (NYSE:BA) engineers Mitch Lee and Ryan Cook, announced on May 15 its third all-electric boat model, the Arc Coast, priced at $168,000. The new 24-foot vessel follows the sold-out Arc One and the still-available Arc Sport, originally priced at $300,000 and $268,000, respectively, and offers a more affordable entry point for recreational boaters. According to Electrek, this new model is aimed at broader recreational markets, offering

items.title: Inspections of Boeing 787 Jets in India Under Way After Crash
items.description: Indian authorities have ordered what they called “extended surveillance” of all Boeing 787 aircraft in the country’s fleet while they investigate the cause of the Air India crash.
